summary: An ordinance authorizing the City Treasurer to cancel the unpaid assessments levied for the improvement of 48th Avenue Southwest, and other streets and avenues, by grading, Local Improvement District No. 3126; Murray Avenue, and other streets and avenues, by trunk sewer, Local Improvement District No. 3402; and 44th Avenue Southwest and other streets and avenues, by watermains, Local Improvement District No. 3827; on the north 20 feet of the west 50 feet of the east 150 feet of Tract 42, Rosenbaum Spring Hill Addition No. 2.
